Class CompareUtil

extends java.lang.Object

    Comparison utility class.

    • Method Detail

      • compareToByte

        public static int compareToByte(byte[] key,
                                byte[] pattern,
                                boolean presearch)

        Compare byte by byte between key and pattern.

        Parameters:
        key - key
        pattern - pattern
        presearch - true when trying prefix match
        Returns:
        0 if key and pattern are same, or key has a same prefix as pattern, >0 if key is larger than pattern, <0 if key is smaller than pattern.

      • compareToJISX0208

        public static int compareToJISX0208(byte[] key,
                                    byte[] pattern,
                                    boolean presearch)

        Comparison between key and pattern with JIS X 0208 character set.

        Parameters:
        key - key (JIS X 0208)
        pattern - pattern (JIS X 0208)
        presearch - true when trying prefix match.
        Returns:
        0 if key and pattern are same, or key has same prefix with pattern, >0 if key is larger than pattern, <0 if key is smaller than pattern.

      • compareToLatin

        public static int compareToLatin(byte[] key,
                                 byte[] pattern,
                                 boolean presearch)

        Comparison between key and pattern with ISO 8859-1 character set.

        Parameters:
        key - key (ISO 8859-1)
        pattern - pattern (ISO 8859-1)
        presearch - true when trying prefix match.
        Returns:
        0 if key and pattern are same, or key has same prefix with pattern, >0 if key is larger than pattern, <0 if key is smaller than pattern.

      • compareToKanaGroup

        public static int compareToKanaGroup(byte[] key,
                                     byte[] pattern,
                                     boolean exact)

        Comparison between key and pattern with JIS X 0208 character set.

        Parameters:
        key - key (JIS X 0208)
        pattern - pattern (JIS X 0208)
        exact - true if trying exact match.
        Returns:
        0 if key and pattern are same, >0 if key is larger than pattern, <0 if key is smaller than pattern.

      • compareToKanaSingle

        public static int compareToKanaSingle(byte[] key,
                                      byte[] pattern,
                                      boolean exact)

        Comparison between key and pattern with JIS X 0208 character set.

        Parameters:
        key - key (JIS X 0208)
        pattern - pattern (JIS X 0208)
        exact - true if trying exact match.
        Returns:
        0 if key and pattern are same, >0 if key is larger than pattern, <0 if key is smaller than pattern.
